# The `DIModule` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a module in the programming language, for example, a Clang module, or a Fortran module. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::DIModule</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents a module in the programming language, for example, a Clang module, or a Fortran module.

Uses the SubclassData1 and SubclassData32 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slots.

Definition at line 2511 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
